meanings.definition: Having the highest degree of sheen.
meanings.sent1: The car's paint was the sheeniest in the whole parking lot.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the sheeniest at the party, shimmering under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The sheeniest shoes in the store caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The sheeniest stars in the sky twinkled brightly on that clear night.
meanings.sent5: The sheeniest diamond sparkled brilliantly in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: He wore the sheeniest tie to the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The sheeniest fabric felt smooth and luxurious against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The sheeniest gift wrap made the present look extra special.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the sheeniest, radiating warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The sheeniest ribbon on the package added a touch of elegance.
